mdufa 0.3.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Find Metrics by Pattern

    find_metrics.Rd

    Find unique performance metric names that match a regular expression pattern. Useful for exploring available metrics in a MDUFA dataset.

    find_metrics(data, pattern)

    Arguments

    data

    A MDUFA dataset with a performance_metric column

    pattern

    A regular expression pattern to search for (case-insensitive)

    Value

    Character vector of unique performance metrics that match the pattern

    Examples

    # Find all metrics related to FDA days
find_metrics(mdufa4, "FDA days")
#>  [1] "Average Number of FDA Days to Substantive Interaction"               
#>  [2] "20th Percentile FDA Days to Substantive Interaction"                 
#>  [3] "40th Percentile FDA Days to Substantive Interaction"                 
#>  [4] "60th Percentile FDA Days to Substantive Interaction"                 
#>  [5] "80th Percentile FDA Days to Substantive Interaction"                 
#>  [6] "Maximum FDA Days to Substantive Interaction"                         
#>  [7] "Average FDA Days to MDUFA IV Decision"                               
#>  [8] "20th Percentile FDA Days to MDUFA IV Decision"                       
#>  [9] "40th Percentile FDA Days to MDUFA IV Decision"                       
#> [10] "60th Percentile FDA Days to MDUFA IV Decision"                       
#> [11] "80th Percentile FDA Days to MDUFA IV Decision"                       
#> [12] "Maximum FDA Days to MDUFA IV Decision"                               
#> [13] "Mean FDA Days for Submissions that Missed the Goal"                  
#> [14] "SI Within 60 FDA Days"                                               
#> [15] "SI Over 60 FDA Days"                                                 
#> [16] "SI Pending Within 60 FDA Days"                                       
#> [17] "SI Pending Over 60 FDA Days"                                         
#> [18] "Current SI Performance Percent Within 60 FDA Days"                   
#> [19] "MDUFA IV Decision Within 90 FDA Days"                                
#> [20] "510(k)s Pending MDUFA IV Decision Over 90 FDA Days"                  
#> [21] "Current Performance Percent Within 90 FDA Days"                      
#> [22] "Average Number of FDA Days to MDUFA IV Decision"                     
#> [23] "90th Percentile FDA Days to MDUFA IV Decision"                       
#> [24] "MDUFA IV Decisions Within 150 FDA Days"                              
#> [25] "De Novos Pending MDUFA IV Decision Over 150 FDA Days"                
#> [26] "Current Performance Percent Within 150 FDA Days"                     
#> [27] "Average FDA Days to Written Feedback"                                
#> [28] "20th Percentile FDA Days to Written Feedback"                        
#> [29] "40th Percentile FDA Days to Written Feedback"                        
#> [30] "60th Percentile FDA Days to Written Feedback"                        
#> [31] "80th Percentile FDA Days to Written Feedback"                        
#> [32] "Maximum FDA Days to Written Feedback"                                
#> [33] "SI within 90 FDA days"                                               
#> [34] "SI over 90 FDA days"                                                 
#> [35] "SI pending within 90 FDA days"                                       
#> [36] "SI pending over 90 FDA days"                                         
#> [37] "Current SI Performance Percent within 90 FDA days"                   
#> [38] "Average number of FDA days to Substantive Interaction"               
#> [39] "20th Percentile FDA days to Substantive Interaction"                 
#> [40] "40th Percentile FDA days to Substantive Interaction"                 
#> [41] "60th Percentile FDA days to Substantive Interaction"                 
#> [42] "80th Percentile FDA days to Substantive Interaction"                 
#> [43] "Maximum FDA days to Substantive Interaction"                         
#> [44] "MDUFA IV Decisions within 150 FDA Days"                              
#> [45] "CLIA Waiver Applications pending MDUFA IV Decision over 150 FDA days"
#> [46] "Current Performance Percent within 150 FDA Days"                     
#> [47] "MDUFA IV Decisions within 320 FDA Days"                              
#> [48] "CLIA Waiver Applications pending MDUFA IV Decision over 320 FDA days"
#> [49] "Current Performance Percent within 320 FDA Days"                     
#> [50] "Average FDA days to MDUFA IV decision"                               
#> [51] "20th Percentile FDA days to MDUFA IV decision"                       
#> [52] "40th Percentile FDA days to MDUFA IV decision"                       
#> [53] "60th Percentile FDA days to MDUFA IV decision"                       
#> [54] "80th Percentile FDA days to MDUFA IV decision"                       
#> [55] "Maximum FDA days to MDUFA IV decision"                               
#> [56] "Current SI Performance Percent within 90 FDA days*"                  
#> [57] "MDUFA IV Decisions within 180 FDA Days"                              
#> [58] "CLIA Waiver Applications pending MDUFA IV Decision over 180 FDA days"
#> [59] "Current Performance Percent within 180 FDA Days*"                    
#> [60] "MDUFA IV Decisions with in 320 FDA Days"                             

# Find all percentage/rate metrics
find_metrics(mdufa4, "^(Rate|Percent)")
#>  [1] "Rate of Submissions Not Accepted for Filing Review"
#>  [2] "Rate of Submissions Not Filed"                     
#>  [3] "Rate of Withdrawal"                                
#>  [4] "Rate of Not Approvable"                            
#>  [5] "Rate of Submissions Not Accepted for Review"       
#>  [6] "Rate of SE Decision"                               
#>  [7] "Rate of NSE Decision"                              
#>  [8] "Rate of Deleted"                                   
#>  [9] "Percent of Cohort Closed"                          
#> [10] "Rate of Granted Decisions"                         
#> [11] "Rate of Declined Decisions"                        
#> [12] "Rate of Withdrawals"
